title: Lens images - object 5-thirds f from concave lens

content.question: A concave lens has a focal length of magnitude <math alttext="f sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>. An object is located a distance <math alttext="five thirds f sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>5</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>f</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> to the left of the lens, as shown in the figure. How far from the lens is the resulting image?

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
